TopicTitle: [WIP] Stock IVA rework with ALCOR props - Development Thread - Wishes are welcome

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I am currently in the process of redoing the IVA's of the stock capsules with the excellent props from alexustas and his ALCOR capsule (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-1-0-2-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%2805-05-2015%29)

It a slow process using Unity 5, since currently the 0.23 parttools are quite limited (no search function; alignment not always working as intended).

Suggestions, ideas and wishes are very welcome!

A small teaser for the Mk1 pod:

Edited June 11, 2015 by Andy81le
Looking good so far going to keep a eye on this thread
I think alexustas is already doing this

I think alexustas is already doing this

Alex only showed MK1-2 but still hasn't released it

Have you seen his youtube channel lately? It looks like he is working on all of them.

https://www.youtube.com/user/alexustas22/videos

I am not trying to stop progess. By all means new IVA's are always working. I m just saying it looks like Alexustas is working on new IVAs. Maybe he is just practicing for Konquest. Who knows?

Excellent that Alexustas in working on new IVA's, he's a master of props. I didn't know that, obviously, as I didn't even know his youtube channel and he hasn't posted in the development thread afaik. It takes a very long time to develop IVA's, so I might just give him a hand through working on the pods. Hence, I will continue.

It remains, that wishes are still welcome as to what props players would like to see/need in the basic pod.
And this mod has done some too you might look at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96148-AeroKerbin-Industries-Modified-IVAs
